description: Kazama Shinji is Sousuke`s Arm Slave loving classmate. He shares the same amount of passion to AS as Sousuke and could be considered Sousuke`s best school friend besides Kaname. His father is Kazama Shintaro and a secretary of Narashino`s Assault Machine Troop. Shinji`s love for AS began when his dad failed to become an AS pilot. As a result of his father`s failure, Shinji strives to discover the result of the failure and to fulfill his father`s dream of becoming a pilot. There is no indication as to what happened to his mother, but it`s assumed that Shintaro is a widower before the series started.
name: Kazama Shinji
